pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchanto aññatarena gāmadvārena atikkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.3: Aññatarā itthī sāmikena saha bhaṇḍitvā gāmato nikkhamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.8: Atha kho tassā itthiyā sāmiko gāmato nikkhamitvā manusse pucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.11: Atha kho so puriso anubandhitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā ākoṭetvā muñci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.12: Atha kho so bhikkhu aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle padhūpento nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.13: Atha kho sā itthī taṃ purisaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.15: api ca ahameva tena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ gacchāmi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.18: Atha kho so puriso taṃ bhikkhuṃ khamāpesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.19: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.22: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.23: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.26: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.27: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.28: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:1.29: “Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya, antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.7: manussitthī, na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ ājānituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.11: “gacchāma bhagini, gacchāmāyya, gacchāmāyya, gacchāma bhagini, ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā gacchāmā”ti saṃvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.13: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.1.14: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.1: Mātugāme mātugāmasaññī saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.2: Mātugāme vematiko saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.3: Mātugāme amātugāmasaññī saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.4: Bhikkhu saṃvidahati mātugāmo na saṃvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.2.5: Yakkhiyā vā petiyā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā vā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc67:2.3.2: asaṃvidahitvā gacchati, mātugāmo saṃvidahati bhikkhu na saṃvidahati, visaṅketena gacchati, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassāti.
